FuncDef: The local-user expire-date command sets the expiration date of a local account. The undo local-user expire-date command restores the default expiration date of a local account. By default, a local account is permanently valid.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a local account.
The value is a string of 1 to 253 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the expiration date of the local account.
The value is expressed in the format of YYYY/MM/DD. The value is a date ranging from 2000/01/01 to 2099/12/31.
